duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute strategic approach and tactical plans across multiple brands within a CPG client.
Assist in development of digital RFPs and brief vendors.
Create and review plans based on a brief and ensure planned metrics are accurate.
Present media plans and provide plan maintenance including objectives/strategies and updates.
Maintain stewardship of competitive analysis using Strategy software to assess media schedules of competitors, interpret data and draw conclusions.
Prepare and update flowcharts and budget trackers.
Prepare and issue buying specs and guidelines to buyers including delivery goals and budgets for use in negotiations.
Review and verify media buys to ensure proper execution.
Contribute to billing reconciliation process and negotiate invoice discrepancies with partners.
Lead and guide marketing specialists in the development, execution, and stewardship of media plans for client’s business.
Measure and report on the performance of media campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
Present to clients, maintain client correspondence and internal documentation.
Manage projects, resources, stakeholders, and participants.

education_certification.credential: B.A. or B.S., preferably in Marketing, Advertising, or related field
